short_description: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is a 10% Vitamin C serum formulated for oily, combination skin.
ingredients_highlight: The formula combines Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid to balance brightening with hydration.
benefits_overview: This serum targets brightening, fades dark spots while being suitable for oily, combination skin types.
detailed_usage: Use on clean, dry skin. Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen. Avoid the eye area and always follow with sunscreen in the morning.
safety_notes: Some users, especially with sensitive skin, may experience mild tingling for sensitive skin. Introduce the serum gradually and discontinue use if irritation persists.

raw.usage: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen
